languages.text: {n}Кажется, пробираясь к вам, лошадь разбила стойло. В глаза бросается пустая кормушка и воняющая гнилью гора овощной ботвы под вашими ногами. Сейчас подход к помоям перекрывает железный забор — лошадь беспокойно ржет и косит на него глазом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: Гора трупов. Что если я позаимствую кусочек?

languages.text: {n}The horse must have smashed through the stall to reach you. You immediately note the empty trough and the fetid pile of vegetable tops under your feet. For the moment, the approach to the rotting waste is blocked by an iron fence. The horse whinnies restlessly as it casts its eye toward the barrier.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Кажется, пробираясь к вам, лошадь разбила стойло. В глаза бросается пустая кормушка и воняющая гнилью гора овощной ботвы под вашими ногами. Сейчас подход к помоям перекрывает железный забор — лошадь беспокойно ржет и косит на него глазом.{/n}

{n}The horse must have smashed through the stall to reach you. You immediately note the empty trough and the fetid pile of vegetable tops nearby. For the moment, the approach to the rotting waste is blocked by an iron fence. The horse whinnies restlessly as it casts its eye toward the barrier.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这匹马肯定是撞破了马厩，才赶到你身边。你立刻注意到了空空如也的食槽，以及你脚边一大堆发臭的蔬菜。此刻，臭气熏天的垃圾堆被铁栅栏挡住了。那匹马将目光投向栅栏，不安地嘶鸣着。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The horse must have smashed through the stall to reach you. You immediately note the empty trough and the fetid pile of vegetable tops under your feet. For the moment, the approach to the rotting waste is blocked by an iron fence. The horse whinnies restlessly as it casts its eye toward the barrier.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这匹马肯定是撞破了马厩，才赶到你身边。你立刻注意到了空空如也的食槽，以及你脚边一大堆发臭的蔬菜。此刻，臭气熏天的垃圾堆被铁栅栏挡住了。那匹马将目光投向栅栏，不安地嘶鸣着。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El caballo debe de haber derribado la puerta de la cuadra para acercarse a ti. Enseguida reparas en el abrevadero vacío y en el fétido montón de verduras podridas que hay bajo tus pies. El acceso a los desechos putrefactos está bloqueado por una verja de hierro. El caballo relincha con impaciencia sin apartar la mirada de la obstrucción.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The horse must have smashed through the stall to reach you. You immediately note the empty trough and the fetid pile of vegetable tops under your feet. For the moment, the approach to the rotting waste is blocked by an iron fence. The horse whinnies restlessly as it casts its eye toward the barrier.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El caballo debe de haber derribado la puerta de la cuadra para acercarse a ti. Enseguida reparas en el abrevadero vacío y en el fétido montón de verduras podridas que hay bajo tus pies. El acceso a los desechos putrefactos está bloqueado por una verja de hierro. El caballo relincha con impaciencia sin apartar la mirada de la obstrucción.{/n}

languages.text: {n}At, sana ulaşmak için durduğu bölmeyi paramparça etmiş olmalı. Hemen boş yalağı ve ayaklarının altındaki kokuşmuş sebze artığı yığınını fark ediyorsun. Çürüyen atıklara giden yol, şimdilik demir bir çitle kapatılmış. Gözünü engele dikmiş olan at, huzursuzca kişniyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The horse must have smashed through the stall to reach you. You immediately note the empty trough and the fetid pile of vegetable tops under your feet. For the moment, the approach to the rotting waste is blocked by an iron fence. The horse whinnies restlessly as it casts its eye toward the barrier.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}At, sana ulaşmak için durduğu bölmeyi paramparça etmiş olmalı. Hemen boş yalağı ve ayaklarının altındaki kokuşmuş sebze artığı yığınını fark ediyorsun. Çürüyen atıklara giden yol, şimdilik demir bir çitle kapatılmış. Gözünü engele dikmiş olan at, huzursuzca kişniyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}馬があなたに触るには馬房を壊さなければならない。あなたはすぐに空になった飼い葉桶と足元にある悪臭を放つ野菜の山が気づく。その腐った廃棄物に近づくには、鉄柵が邪魔になっている。馬はその柵に目をやると、落ち着きなく嘶く。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The horse must have smashed through the stall to reach you. You immediately note the empty trough and the fetid pile of vegetable tops under your feet. For the moment, the approach to the rotting waste is blocked by an iron fence. The horse whinnies restlessly as it casts its eye toward the barrier.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}馬があなたに触るには馬房を壊さなければならない。あなたはすぐに空になった飼い葉桶と悪臭を放つ野菜の山が近くにあることに気づく。その腐った廃棄物に近づくには、鉄柵が邪魔になっている。馬はその柵に目をやると、落ち着きなく嘶く。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le cheval a dû défoncer le box pour parvenir jusqu'à vous. En regardant alentour, vous remarquez très vite l'auge vide, ainsi qu'un tas fétide de fanes de légumes de l'autre côté d'une clôture en fer. Le cheval hennit en lançant un regard appuyé vers la barrière.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The horse must have smashed through the stall to reach you. You immediately note the empty trough and the fetid pile of vegetable tops under your feet. For the moment, the approach to the rotting waste is blocked by an iron fence. The horse whinnies restlessly as it casts its eye toward the barrier.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le cheval a dû défoncer le box pour parvenir jusqu'à vous. En regardant alentour, vous remarquez très vite l'auge vide, ainsi qu'un tas fétide de fanes de légumes de l'autre côté d'une clôture en fer. Le cheval hennit en lançant un regard appuyé vers la barrière.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das Pferd muss aus seiner Box ausgebrochen sein, um zu dir zu gelangen. Du bemerkst sofort den leeren Wassertrog und einen Haufen verdorbenes Gemüse unter deinen Füßen. Der Weg zu den fauligen Abfällen wird im Augenblick durch einen eisernen Zaun versperrt. Das Pferd wiehert rastlos und blickt zu der Barriere.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The horse must have smashed through the stall to reach you. You immediately note the empty trough and the fetid pile of vegetable tops under your feet. For the moment, the approach to the rotting waste is blocked by an iron fence. The horse whinnies restlessly as it casts its eye toward the barrier.{/n}

Der Weg zu den fauligen Abfällen wird im Augenblick durch einen eisernen Zaun versperrt. Das Pferd wiehert rastlos und blickt zu der Barriere.{/n}
